item.description:
Description:

The race starts exactly at 10 a.m.

Roads remain closed to traffic until 11:30 a.m.

Toilet facilities are available in many areas.

SAFETY ALERT: For safety and insurance purposes, no wheels of any kind (e.g., in-line skates, baby strollers, bicycles) and no dogs are allowed on the race course

CT Sports Massage will provide pre- and post-race massage at Bennet Middle School, 8 a.m. to 12 noon.

Packets (Timing Tag and Bib Numbers) are mailed to addresses within the continental US for all on-line registrations received on or before November 13th. After that date, packets must be picked up at Walk-in Registration (see Registration - Walk-In) or Packet Pick-up on Race Day from 8:00am to 9:15am at Bennet Middle School. 

Registration:

You can register to run or walk in the Manchester Road Race.  Please visit our Online Registration Page. The registration fee applies whether you are running or walking the race.

Packets (bib and tag) are mailed to addresses within the continental US for all registrations received before November 13th. After that date, packets must be picked up at Walk-in Registration (see Registration - Walk-In) or Packet Pick-up on Race Day from 8:00am to 9:15am at Bennet Academy.

Note: You can register online up until noon EST November 18th. After noon EST November 18th, you will have to register at Walk-In Registration.

Online Registration will open September 1st.
item.name: Manchester Road Race
